name: yuyu-lolita-v2
description: YuYu Lolita Shopping website - modern stack migration

scripts.dev: (cd apps/api && bun run dev) & (cd apps/web && bun run dev)
scripts.start:codespaces: cp .env.codespaces .env && (cd apps/api && bun run start) & (cd apps/web && bun run start)
scripts.build: bun run build:api && bun run build:web
scripts.build:windows: bun run build:api && bun run build:web
scripts.build:codespaces: cp .env.codespaces .env && bun run build:api && bun run build:web
scripts.start: (cd apps/api && bun run start) & (cd apps/web && bun run start)
scripts.db:migrate:codespaces: cp .env.codespaces .env && cd packages/db && bun run migrate
scripts.db:seed:codespaces: cp .env.codespaces .env && cd packages/db && bun run seed
scripts.type-check: (cd apps/web && bun run check) && (cd apps/api && bun run type-check)
